title: All Ball (Pt. 2 of 2) Former All-NBA Defender Raja Bell Talks Kobe Rivalry, The Clothesline, Respect, Unexpected Friendship, Legacy
itunes:title: All Ball (Pt. 2 of 2) Former All-NBA Defender Raja Bell Talks Kobe Rivalry, The Clothesline, Respect, Unexpected Friendship, Legacy
description:
This week, in the second part of a two part interview, Gottlieb continues his conversation with former All-NBA Defender Raja Bell on the escalation of his on-court rivalry with Kobe, the clothesline, their mutual respect, unexpected friendship, and the Mamba's legacy. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
